actions.text: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A036) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 255 (Roll no. 594).
Hartzler amendment (A036) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment (A036) offered by Mrs. Hartzler to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mrs. Hartzler to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A036) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 255 (Roll no. 594).
Roll call votes on amendments in House

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to repeal the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to approve as part of the construction of federal-aid highways the costs of landscape and roadside development.
purpose: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to repeal the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to approve as part of the construction of federal-aid highways the costs of landscape and roadside development.
